name: Dodge the creep (DrakePhantom)
description:
Control :
Arrow key of keyboard or mouse click
Start the game by clicking "Start" button or presse "enter"

On phone or touchscreen device use mouse input control 

First game developped on godot
Start from the initiation project of Godot : Dodge The Creep 
Added feature :

  • Collectable
  • High scores
  • Attempt of visual and sound feedback
  • Mouse or keyboard control selection

Link to godot tutorial : https://docs.godotengine.org/en/latest/getting_started/first_2d_game/index.html

References :

Cursor icons created by Freepik - Flaticon

Keyboard icons created by deemakdaksina - Flaticon
